database.name: VIEW AD_AUDIT_TRAIL_V
database.view: SELECT at.ad_audit_trail_id, at.ad_client_id, at.ad_org_id, at.isactive, at.created, at.createdby, at.updated, at.updatedby, at.ad_table_id, at.record_id, at.record_revision, at.ad_user_id, at."time", at.processtype, at.process_id, at.action, at.ad_column_id, at.old_char, at.new_char, at.old_nchar, at.new_nchar, at.old_number, at.new_number, at.old_date, at.new_date, CASE WHEN at.processtype = 'P' THEN ( SELECT p.name FROM ad_process p WHERE p.ad_process_id = at.process_id) WHEN at.processtype = 'W' THEN ( SELECT t.name FROM ad_tab t WHERE t.ad_tab_id = at.process_id) WHEN at.processtype = 'X' THEN ( SELECT f.name FROM ad_form f WHERE f.ad_form_id = at.process_id) ELSE '**' END AS process_desc FROM ad_audit_trail at
